snippet: Businesses are abandoning a right-wing group that helped enact dangerous statutes in many states.
abstract: Editorial welcomes decision by several large corporations to abandon their support for the American Legislative Exchange Council, which promotes right-wing legislative causes; notes that departures are implicitly related to ALEC's powerful support of Stand Your Ground laws that have come under scrutiny following the murder of Trayvon Martin.
lead_paragraph: Businesses are abandoning a right-wing group that helped enact dangerous statutes in many states.
